titleInfo.title: Improvement programme for metropolitan Calcutta: 1964-1971. Vol. 1: A Note on Comprehensiveness Plainning. Vol. 2a: A Note on Master Plan for Water Supply, Sewerage and Drainage. A Note on the subsidised housing needs generated by the improvement programm Vol. 7: A note on concentrated improvement programm for Hawrah and Tollyguange. Vol. 8: A Note on the design for an urban redevelopment programm for the Calcutta Metropolitan City Vol. 9:: A Note on the Suburban development in Sonapur, Kona and Salt Lake and its relation to the planned growth. Vol. 10: A Note on the Modernization of traffic operations in Calcutta. Vol. 11: A Note on the Interim major street and highway plan for Calcutta. Vol. 12a: A Note on the Rapid Transit proposals for the principal passanger traffic corridors in Calcutta. Vol. 12b: A Note on Rapid Transit Proposals for the principal passengers traffif corridors in Calcutta. Vol. 13: A Note on the Proposed Calcutta-Howrah High-Level Bridges across Hooghly. Vol. 14: A Note on Modernization of refuse collection and disposal in Calcutta and Howrah Vol. 15 A Note on Application of National Goals and Standrads for Education to the Calcutta Met Distirct. Vol. 18: A Note on Parks and Recreation needs o fthe Calcutta met Distruct and How they can be met. Vol. 19: A Note on the Development of Haldia with respect to the Port of Calcutta and the Metropolitan Region. vol. 20:: A Note on the Relationship of Farakka Barrage to the Planning of the Calcutta Met District Vol. 21a: A Note on the Regional Planning in Eastern India and its relation to Urbanization in West Bengal. Vol 21b: A Note on Regional Planning in Eastern India and its Relation to Urbanization in West Bengal

name.namePart: West Bengal. Calcutta Metropolitan Planning Organisation

titleInfo.title: v. 1. A note on comprehensive planning for the Calcutta metropolitan district and its relation to the improvement programme -- v. 3a. A note on the interim water supply project -- v. 3b. A note on the interim water supply project -- v. 4. A note on a multiple and concerted attack to eliminate endemic cholera -- v. 6a. A note on subsidised housing needs generated by the improvement programme -- v. 6b. A note on a demonstration of new techniques in housing construction and management -- v. 7. A note on concentrated improvement programmes for Howrah and Tollygunge -- v. 8. A note on the design for an urban redevelopment programme for the Calcutta metropolitan district -- v. 9. A note on suburban development in Sonarpur, Kona, and Salt Lake and its relation to the planned growth of the Calcutta metropolitan district -- v. 11. A note on the interim major street and highway plan for the Calcutta metropolitan district -- v. 12a. A note on rapid transit proposals for the principal passenger traffic corridors in Calcutta -- v. 12b. A note on rapid transit proposals for the principal passenger traffic corridors in Calcutta -- v. 13. A note on the proposed Calcutta-Howrah high-level bridge across the Hooghly -- v. 14. A note on modernisation of refuse collection and disposal in Calcutta and Howrah -- v. 15. A note on application of national goals and standards for education to the Calcutta metropolitan district -- v. 16. A note on a proposed network of community service centres for the Calcutta metropolitan district -- v. 17. A note on urban community development as a method of government-citizen partnership for improving living conditions in metropolitan Calcutta -- v. 18. A note on parks and recreation needs of Calcutta metropolitan district and how they can be met -- v. 19. A note on the development of Haldia with respect to the Calcutta metropolitan district -- v. 20. A note on the relationship of Farakka barrage to the planning of Calcutta metropolitan district -- v. 21. A note on regional planning in Eastern India and its relation to urbanization in West Bengal and metropolitan Calcutta.
